short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for showing Ads on Web Sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you also think that if you were paid for every ad you see on the internet in your life, you would become a millionaire?

Well, you may not become a millionaire, but now itâ€™s real to get paid for ads you will see on your computer screen.

Clevert is a Google Chrome extension that gives you an opportunity to earn money for every ad you watched.

The extension is easy to install and use. Once installed the extension and registered an account, the platform itself will show a modal window with ads at the edge of your screen. You can close it or click on the advertisement you are interested in, or completely ignore it and continue your work. Even you can disable and enable ads anytime you want in one click. Once you activated the extension and registered you can forget about it. And after a few years, it will be a very happy surprise for you to have the extra money in your account. 

You can spend your money online or can transfer it to your bank account or to your PayPal account.

If you are a company interested in showing your ads to your potential customers through this platform that will be shown in the modal windows of users of this extension, all you need to do is register on the https://clevert.ae website and place your ad.
